---
title: "Modeling"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readr)
library(arm)
library(nnet)
```

```{r}
pre_raise <- read.csv('pre_raise.csv')
```

```{r}
model1 <- glm(didRaise ~ ., data = pre_raise, family = "binomial")
```

```{r}
binnedplot(model1$fitted.values[-c(209193)], model1$residuals[-c(209193)])
```

```{r}
model2 <- multinom(hand_strength ~ position + stack_size, data = pre_raise)
```

```{r}
binnedplot(model2$fitted.values[,1], model2$residuals[,1])
```

```{r}
binnedplot(model2$fitted.values[,2], model2$residuals[,2])
```

```{r}
binnedplot(model2$fitted.values[,3], model2$residuals[,3])
```

```{r}
survival <- read.csv('surv_form_dummied.csv')
```

```{r}
model3 <- glm(event ~ ., data = survival, family = "binomial")
binnedplot(model3$fitted.values, model3$residuals)
```
